divs: sighting detailsat about 3:45 am, i was out looking at\for the leonid meteor shower. directly to the south, i saw the same thing as i described in my earlier report. it is a light flashing in red, white, and blue. again, it seems to be "hovering" over wide open spaces. i observed it as it stayed stationary for about 15 minutes. i came in for coffee and to warm up a bit. when i went back out, at 4:15 am, it was in the same relative position. i turned away to get a chair, and when i turned back, it was gone. as of 4:30 am, it hadn't returned.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Aspermont
There were no other sightings in Aspermont on or around November 17th 2009
